statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, voice_command_mode FROM user_preferences;
SELECT temperature_unit, user_id FROM user_preferences;
SELECT voice_command_mode, light_theme_enabled FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE temperature_unit='Celsius';
SELECT user_id, voice_command_mode, light_theme_enabled, temperature_unit FROM user_preferences
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE temperature_unit = 'Celsius' AND light_theme_enabled = true
SELECT user_id, voice_command_mode FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE light_theme_enabled = false ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users, temperature_unit FROM user_preferences GROUP BY temperature_unit HAVING total_users > 10
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, command_history FROM user_preferences WHERE voice_command_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, device_type, room_location FROM device_settings WHERE room_location = 'Living Room';
SELECT temperature, light_intensity FROM device_settings WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT user_id, volume_level FROM user_preferences WHERE command_history IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, voice_command_enabled FROM user_preferences WHERE volume_level > 50 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_type, room_location FROM device_settings WHERE light_intensity < 50 ORDER BY room_location;
SELECT user_id, command_history FROM user_preferences WHERE voice_command_enabled IS TRUE AND volume_level < 75 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, volume_level FROM user_preferences WHERE voice_command_enabled = FALSE AND command_history IS NOT NULL ORDER BY volume_level DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, room_location, temperature FROM device_settings WHERE device_type = 'Smart Thermostat' AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 25 ORDER BY room_location, temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, voice_command FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_type, device_status FROM DevicePreferences WHERE device_status='ON';
SELECT room_id, light_setting FROM RoomPreferences WHERE temperature_setting > 25;
SELECT user_id, device_name, device_status FROM DevicePreferences WHERE device_type='AC';
SELECT user_id, voice_command FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT room_id, temperature_setting, light_setting FROM RoomPreferences WHERE room_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, device_type, device_name FROM DevicePreferences WHERE device_status = 'ON';
SELECT room_id, light_setting, music_playlist FROM RoomPreferences WHERE light_setting = 'ON';
SELECT device_id, user_id, device_name, device_status FROM DevicePreferences WHERE user_id = 3 AND device_status = 'OFF';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, voice_command FROM user_preferences WHERE command_type = 'lights';
SELECT room_name, temperature_sensor FROM rooms ORDER BY room_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_status = true;
SELECT executed_at, voice_command FROM commands_history WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY executed_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, voice_command FROM user_preferences ORDER BY voice_command DESC;
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE temperature_sensor = TRUE AND light_sensor = TRUE;
SELECT room_name, COUNT(*) AS sensor_count FROM rooms GROUP BY room_name;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM commands_history ORDER BY executed_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT command_id, command_text FROM VoiceCommands ORDER BY command_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_id FROM UserDevices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT command_text FROM VoiceCommands WHERE command_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM SmartHomeDevices;
SELECT user_id, device_id FROM UserDevices ORDER BY user_id DESC;
